abstract: An opaque type that identifies a remote device displaying scene content in a [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/RemoteImmersiveSpace].
overview:
## Overview

Access this from the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/EnvironmentValues/remoteDeviceIdentifier] environment property in a remote scene to get the identifier for that scene’s device.

When accessed in a context that is being presented on the local device, this value will be `nil`.

This identifier can also be used to initialize an `ARKitSession` associated with the remote device.

items.description: Returns the `ar_device` associated with this device.
items.name: cDevice
